title: How AU Small Finance Bank is accelerating credit card adoption for underserved segments in India - YourStory
content: How AU Small Finance Bank is accelerating credit card adoption for underserved segments in India  YourStory
description: With the total value of credit card transactions expected to cross Rs 5,000 crore by 2027, with a CAGR of 39.22%, Mayank Markanday of AU Small Finance Bank talks about how the bank is helping it grow among underserved segments in India.
